newsitem.title: USA: White House's Raines confident of budget passage.
newsitem.headline: White House's Raines confident of budget passage.

text.p: White House budget director Franklin Raines said Tuesday he was confident Congress will pass the fiscal 1998 budget plan despite the opposition of House Democratic Leader Richard Gephardt of Missouri.

Raines spoke with reporters after briefing the House Democratic Caucus on the five-year budget deal. "We are very confident we will have a majority of the caucus and we will have a very substantial part of the House leadership," he said.
"We will achieve our goal of having a majority of Democrats supporting the (budget) resolution," Raines said.
